oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Transitioning to Organic
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Das, Kasturi
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: India
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The article undertakes an in-depth analysis of financial and other obstacles faced by the farmers while converting from conventional to organic agricultural practices, particularly in the context of India, where Governement support for organic agriculture is almost non-existent.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Das, Kasturi (2004) Transitioning to Organic. www.indiatogether.org, June 2004.
